item.description: Singles who love dogs can meet in a relaxed fun atmosphere! Enjoy great conversation with other like-minded singles. Bring a picture of your favorite dog(s) and a funny story to share. Please do not bring your dog. Dress casual and refreshments available. Admission $10. To reserve, call Cheryl at Country Dog 860-621-PAWS (7297). Directions to 1177 West Street: I-84 Exit 31 West Street (Rt. 229N), 1/8 mile toward ESPN, corner West Street and Curtis Street.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Who Love Dogs Party
